name: philistine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who refuses to see the beauty or the value of art or culture: I wouldn't have expected them to enjoy a film of that quality anyway - they're just a bunch of philistines!

one of a race of people who lived in the area near the coast of the southeast Mediterranean in ancient times and were often at war with the Israelites
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who enjoys only popular entertainment but does not appreciate art, literature, or music of high quality
